system.description: When unarmored, make one extra attack at highest BAB with -2 penalty on all attacks that round (full attack only). Penalty -1 at 5th, 0 at 9th. At 11th gain a second extra attack (greater flurry). Only with unarmed strikes or special monk weapons (kama, nunchaku, quarterstaff, sai, shuriken, siangham).
